= Create an AMQ connection

The AMQ to REST API sample integration starts by connecting to an
AMQ broker that is provided in your OpenShift project. Before you
start to create the integration itself, you must:

. <<amq2api-start-the-broker>>
. <<amq2api-create-connection-to-amq-broker>>

include::amq2api_create_connection_to_broker.adoc[leveloffset=+1]
